title: Drawing, "Japanese Woman with three little Girls", ca. 1940
medium: Pen and black ink on paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink, on buttons of mother and two children: American Citizens; on button of third child: Enemy Alien.
description: Japanese woman with three small Japanese girls walking single file. All wearing large buttons.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Japanese Woman with three little Girls", ca. 1940.
ca. 1940. Pen and black ink on paper. Gift of Christina Malman. 1947-110-28.
